CustomField.description: Stores the API names of additional fields from the Milestone object in the Billings, Project Reporting, and Revenue Forecast datasets in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stores the API names of additional fields from the Project object in the Billings, Project Reporting, and Revenue Forecast datasets in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app.
CustomField.label: Additional Milestone Field API Names
